alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 08 at 4:46AM HST until December 09 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR LEEWARD KOHALA UNTIL 6 PM HST FRIDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR BIG ISLAND SUMMITS UNTIL 6 AM HST FRIDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY FOR PORTIONS OF BIG ISLAND AND MAUI COUNTY INCLUDING HALEAKALA SUMMIT UNTIL 6 PM HST FRIDAY... .Strong trade winds will be especially strong through Friday, especially where the terrain accelerates the flow. Strongest winds will occur over and downwind of terrain, and in saddle areas. ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...East winds 45 to 60 mph with gusts to 70 mph. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking difficult. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Be prepared for road-closures. Postpone travel to the summits until conditions improve.
